doc:
Charlene Tilton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlene_Tilton 0 Charlene L. Tilton (born December 1, 1958) is an American actress and singer. She is best known for playing Lucy Ewing, the saucy niece of John "J.R." Ewing Jr. (played by Larry Hagman), on the television series Dallas. Charlene_L._Tilton ( born December_1_,_1958 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer . She is_best_known for playing Lucy_Ewing , the_saucy_niece of John_"_J.R._"_Ewing_Jr. (_played by Larry_Hagman_) , on the_television_series_Dallas .
